Articles.Content:
So I'm playing on ksp 1.2 with kerbalism and interstellar and some other mods I'll post them later but,I'm trying to make a warp ship to blalo in kss which can carry 1000 tons.

I hope that some of you guys can help me out and also learn from others.

 

-Thanks

 Devan

Edited May 31, 2017 by Devan kerman
I don't know if I would recommend using Kerbalism for KSS. It isn't very compatible, and because there's no compatibility it won't work right, especially around other stars.
